verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O to be like Thee! blessed Redeemer, This is my constant longing and prayer; Gladly I’ll forfeit all of earth’s treasures, Jesus, Thy perfect likeness to wear.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: O to be like Thee, full of compassion, Loving, forgiving, tender and kind, Helping the helpless, cheering the fainting, Seeking the wand’ring sinner to find.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O to be like Thee! lowly in spirit, Holy and harmless, patient and brave; Meekly enduring cruel reproaches, Willing to suffer others to save.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O to be like Thee! Lord I am coming, Now to receive th'anointing divine; All that I am and have I am bringing. Lord, from this moment all shall be Thine.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O to be like thee! while I am pleading, Pour out Thy Spirit, fill with Thy love; Make me a temple meet for Thy dwelling, Fit me for life and heaven above.
